explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses a hybrid forecasting model which involves machine learning techniques for predicting CO2 emission prices.
explanations.supervised learning: The model uses support vector regression, which is a supervised learning method, to forecast carbon prices.
explanations.regression: The paper explicitly mentions the use of support vector regression for forecasting carbon prices.
explanations.support vector machine: The proposed FIG-SVM model includes a support vector machine (SVM) component for forecasting.
explanations.SVM: The abbreviation SVM is used in the paper to refer to the support vector machine component of the proposed model.
